Spokane_Valley.Saltese Uplands Conservation Area: The Saltese Uplands Conservation Area is a 522 acre conservation area in Spokane County in the U.S. state of Washington. The conservation area covers the Saltese Uplands, overlooking the Saltese Flats, on the west slope of Carlson Hill. The area is open to the public and contains 7 miles (11 km) of trails.
